Method Detail

getCertificate

public ICaCertificate getCertificate(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IPath path)
                              throws GridException
Description copied from interface: ICaCertificateLoader
Get a certificate from the specified path. The path has to point to a file. If the certificate loader is not able to retrieve a certificate from the specified path it simply returns null.

Specified by:
getCertificate in interface ICaCertificateLoader
Parameters:
path - The path pointing to a file from which to import the certificate.
Returns:
The imported certificate or null if this certificate loader was not able to retrieve a certificate from the specified path.
Throws:
GridException - If an error occures while the certificate is imported.

getCertificate

public ICaCertificate getCertificate(java.net.URI uri,
                                     java.lang.String certID,
                                     org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                              throws GridException
Description copied from interface: ICaCertificateLoader
Get the certificate with the specified ID from the specified URI. The URI may be a remote or local repository. In each case the URI has to point to a directory.

Specified by:
getCertificate in interface ICaCertificateLoader
Parameters:
uri - The location from which to import the certificate.
certID - The ID of the certificate. Normally this is the certificates file name. But this may depend on the concrete implementation.
monitor - A IProgressMonitor that is used to indicate the progress of the import operation.
Returns:
The imported certificate or null if no certificate could be imported from the specified location.
Throws:
GridException - If an error occurs while the certificate is imported.

getCertificateList

public java.lang.String[] getCertificateList(java.net.URI uri,
                                             org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                      throws GridException
Description copied from interface: ICaCertificateLoader
Get a list of certificate IDs that are found at the specified URI. The returned IDs can be used in combination with the URI to finally retrieve a certificate with ICaCertificateLoader.getCertificate(URI, String, IProgressMonitor).

Specified by:
getCertificateList in interface ICaCertificateLoader
Parameters:
uri - The location to be queried for available certificates.
monitor - A progress monitor for monitoring the progress of this operation.
Returns:
A list of certifcate IDs that could be found at the specified location. This may be null if no certificates could be found.
Throws:
GridException - If an error occurs while querying the specified location.
See Also:
ICaCertificateLoader.getCertificate(URI, String, IProgressMonitor)

getPredefinedRemoteLocations

public java.net.URI[] getPredefinedRemoteLocations()
Description copied from interface: ICaCertificateLoader
Get a list of predefined import location for this certificate loader.

Specified by:
getPredefinedRemoteLocations in interface ICaCertificateLoader
Returns:
The list of predefined certificate repositories.
